items.answer: We accommodate orders from 50 to 10,000 units, with flexible manufacturing capabilities to meet diverse client requirements across different industries.
items.question: What is your minimum order quantity?

items.answer: Typical project turnaround ranges from 2-6 weeks depending on complexity, with rush options available for urgent manufacturing needs.
items.question: How quickly can you complete a manufacturing project?

items.answer: We maintain ISO 9001:2015 certification and follow strict quality control processes to ensure precision and reliability in all manufactured components.
items.question: What quality certifications do you maintain?

items.answer: We specialize in brass, stainless steel, aluminum, and other metals, providing comprehensive manufacturing solutions for diverse industrial applications.
items.question: What materials can you work with?

aboutusintro.title: About RT Turnomatics
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering Experts with Global Manufacturing Capabilities
aboutusintro.description: RT Turnomatics is a precision manufacturing firm specializing in high-quality brass and metal components. Founded in 2021, we leverage advanced CNC technologies to serve automotive, pneumatic, and aerospace industries with exceptional engineering solutions.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: RT Turnomatics delivers exceptional precision and reliability. Their brass components have significantly improved our manufacturing efficiency and product quality.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: Outstanding precision manufacturing with consistently high-quality aerospace components. Their engineering expertise is truly remarkable.
